sentences.en: a bloated body floating in the canal
sentences.cn: 沟渠里一具发胀的浮尸

sentences.en: A bloated carcass of a dog lay lolled on bladderwrack.
sentences.cn: 一具胀得鼓鼓的狗尸耷拉着四肢趴在狸藻上.

sentences.en: Diners do not want to leave the table feeling bloated.
sentences.cn: 食客们不想吃到肚子胀鼓鼓的才离开饭桌。

sentences.en: Does he feel bloated after a heavy fatty, or greasy meal?
sentences.cn: 他吃了大量的脂肪性或油腻的食物后感到饱胀 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her body bloated and puffed up till pain seemed to burst out through her skin.
sentences.cn: 她身体一直肿胀，最后疼得皮肤像要涨裂开似的。

sentences.en: Her face is bloated and squarish.
Her features had been bloated by years of drinking.
sentences.cn: 她酗酒多年，已变得面部浮肿。

sentences.en: I feel really bloated after that meal.
sentences.cn: 吃完那顿饭后，我觉得肚子很鼓。

sentences.en: I've had so much to eat I feel absolutely bloated.
sentences.cn: 我吃得过多,肚子胀得不得了.

sentences.en: Join the 1 % of benzoic acid reduces the tendency to bloated his.
sentences.cn: 增入1%苯甲酸可贬低不乾瘪方向.

sentences.en: She was about to turn back when something about the bloated face struck her as fami - liar.
sentences.cn: 她刚要转身离开,突然觉得那张膨胀的脸有点熟悉.

sentences.en: She was mildly bloated from head to toe.
The bloated corpse was taken from the river.
sentences.cn: 从河里捞起一具被水浸胀了的尸体.

sentences.en: The Jack was sitting in a corner, who had a bloated pair of shoes on.
sentences.cn: 那个伙计坐在墙角里, 他脚上穿着一双胀得胖胖的靴子.

sentences.en: There is some bloated cabbage in the airtight pot.
sentences.cn: 那个闷罐儿里腌制着一些白菜.

words.tran_cn: 膨胀的东西，肿胀的人；肿胀病人；自满的人
肿胀，得意（bloat的过去时形式）

trans.tran_en: full of liquid, gas, food etc, so that you look or feel much larger than normal

trans.tran_cn: 使膨胀，使肿胀( bloat的过去式和过去分词)，用盐腌
